name: Block Strikes Back
description:
It's block's turn to make a counterattack against the snakes.
Block hero vs Snake empire!

Swipe on the screen to move blocks and destroy the snakes.
You can destroy snakes as much as the number on blocks.
You can earn score as much as the number of destroyed snakes with balls.
Get bonus blocks and make the block number bigger.
It is easy to clear but hard to achieve a high score.
Compete with your friends.
Free to play & Endless game play

Game Features:

- Free to play
- Endless game play
- Simple swipe control
- Challenge your friends with the best high score
